info.title: image-api
info.description:
Searching and fetching all images used in the NDLA platform.

The Image API provides an endpoint for searching in and fetching images used in NDLA resources. Meta-data are also searched and returned in the results. Examples of meta-data are title, alt-text, language and license.
The API can resize and crop transitions on the returned images to enable use in special contexts, e.g. low bandwidth scenarios

get.description: Find images in the ndla.no database.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Return only images with titles, alt-texts or tags matching the specified query.

parameters.name: minimum-size
parameters.description: Return only images with full size larger than submitted value in bytes.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing language.

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: Fallback to existing language if language is specified.

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: Return only images with provided license.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
The sorting used on results.
             The following are supported: -relevance, relevance, -title, title, -lastUpdated, lastUpdated, -id, id.
             Default is by -relevance (desc) when query is set, and title (asc) when query is empty.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the search hits to display.

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: The number of search hits to display for each page. Defaults to 10 and max is 10000.

parameters.name: podcast-friendly
parameters.description: Filter images that are podcast friendly. Width==heigth and between 1400 and 3000.

parameters.name: search-context
parameters.description:
A unique string obtained from a search you want to keep scrolling in. To obtain one from a search, provide one of the following values: [0,initial,start,first].
When scrolling, the parameters from the initial search is used, except in the case of 'language'.
This value may change between scrolls. Always use the one in the latest scroll result (The context, if unused, dies after 1m).
If you are not paginating past 10000 hits, you can ignore this and use 'page' and 'page-size' instead.

parameters.name: model-released
parameters.description: Filter whether the image(s) should be model-released or not. Multiple values can be specified in a comma separated list. Possible values include: yes,no,not-applicable,not-set

post.summary: Upload a new image with meta information.
post.description: Upload a new image file with meta data.

get.description: Find images in the ndla.no database.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Return only images with titles, alt-texts or tags matching the specified query.

parameters.name: minimum-size
parameters.description: Return only images with full size larger than submitted value in bytes.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The ISO 639-1 language code describing language.

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: Fallback to existing language if language is specified.

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: Return only images with provided license.

parameters.name: includeCopyrighted
parameters.description: Return copyrighted images. May be omitted.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
The sorting used on results.
             The following are supported: -relevance, relevance, -title, title, -lastUpdated, lastUpdated, -id, id.
             Default is by -relevance (desc) when query is set, and title (asc) when query is empty.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number of the search hits to display.

parameters.name: page-size
parameters.description: The number of search hits to display for each page. Defaults to 10 and max is 10000.

parameters.name: podcast-friendly
parameters.description: Filter images that are podcast friendly. Width==heigth and between 1400 and 3000.

parameters.name: search-context
parameters.description:
A unique string obtained from a search you want to keep scrolling in. To obtain one from a search, provide one of the following values: [0,initial,start,first].
When scrolling, the parameters from the initial search is used, except in the case of 'language'.
This value may change between scrolls. Always use the one in the latest scroll result (The context, if unused, dies after 1m).
If you are not paginating past 10000 hits, you can ignore this and use 'page' and 'page-size' instead.

parameters.name: model-released
parameters.description: Filter whether the image(s) should be model-released or not. Multiple values can be specified in a comma separated list. Possible values include: yes,no,not-applicable,not-set

parameters.name: users
parameters.description:
List of users to filter by.
The value to search for is the user-id from Auth0.
UpdatedBy on article and user in editorial-notes are searched.

get.summary: Fetch an image with options to resize and crop
get.description: Fetches a image with options to resize and crop

parameters.name: image_id
parameters.description: The ID of the image

parameters.name: app-key
parameters.description: Your app-key. May be omitted to access api anonymously, but rate limiting may apply on anonymous access.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The target width to resize the image (the unit is pixles). Image proportions are kept intact

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The target height to resize the image (the unit is pixles). Image proportions are kept intact

parameters.name: cropStartX
parameters.description: The first image coordinate X, in percent (0 to 100) or pixels depending on cropUnit, specifying the crop start position. If used the other crop parameters must also be supplied

parameters.name: cropStartY
parameters.description: The first image coordinate Y, in percent (0 to 100) or pixels depending on cropUnit, specifying the crop start position. If used the other crop parameters must also be supplied

parameters.name: cropEndX
parameters.description: The end image coordinate X, in percent (0 to 100) or pixels depending on cropUnit, specifying the crop end position. If used the other crop parameters must also be supplied

parameters.name: cropEndY
parameters.description: The end image coordinate Y, in percent (0 to 100) or pixels depending on cropUnit, specifying the crop end position. If used the other crop parameters must also be supplied

parameters.name: cropUnit
parameters.description: The unit of the crop parameters. Can be either 'percent' or 'pixel'. If omitted the unit is assumed to be 'percent'

parameters.name: focalX
parameters.description: The end image coordinate X, in percent (0 to 100), specifying the focal point. If used the other focal point parameter, width and/or height, must also be supplied

parameters.name: focalY
parameters.description: The end image coordinate Y, in percent (0 to 100), specifying the focal point. If used the other focal point parameter, width and/or height, must also be supplied

parameters.name: ratio
parameters.description: The wanted aspect ratio, defined as width/height. To be used together with the focal parameters. If used the width and height is ignored and derived from the aspect ratio instead.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The wanted aspect ratio, defined as width/height. To be used together with the focal parameters. If used the width and height is ignored and derived from the aspect ratio instead.

parameters.name: cropUnit

parameters.name: focalX

parameters.name: ratio
